face off.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to fight, argue, or compete with someone, or to get into a position in which you are ready to do this
face off.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The two candidates will face off in a televised debate on Friday.
face off.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a face-off between police and rioters
